program_description: allows businesses to import goods into Canada without having to pay customs duties as long as the goods were either stored, processed or used to manufacture other goods and then later exported.
allows businesses to apply for a refund of customs duties paid on imported goods that are later re-exported or destroyed under Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) supervision.

allows importers to store imported or domestic goods destined for export in their own private licensed or publicly licensed CBSA customs bonded warehouse without having to pay customs duties and other import duties or taxes including the GST.
removes the requirement to pay GST/HST on imported goods and some domestic goods. It is intended to benefit export-oriented businesses that store or process goods and then re-export those goods.

relieves participants of the requirement to pay the GST/HST on imported goods belonging to non-residents, as long as these goods are imported for processing, distribution or storage and are later exported.
